tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cross_docking_performance_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    total_shipments INT,
    avg_processing_time FLOAT,
    peak_hours_start TIME,
    peak_hours_end TIME
)

CREATE TABLE performance_reports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_date DATE,
 warehouse_id INT,
 total_shipments INT,
 total_delays INT
);

CREATE TABLE shipment_details (
 shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 warehouse_id INT,
 shipment_type VARCHAR,
 shipment_date DATE,
 sender_address VARCHAR,
 receiver_address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE docking_logs (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 docking_time TIME,
 docking_duration INT,
 dock_worker_id INT,
 docked_shipment_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE improvement_areas (
 area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 area_name VARCHAR,
 description TEXT,
 suggested_actions TEXT,
 urgency_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  operation_id INT,
  log_time TIMESTAMP,
  details TEXT
);
